CustomField.formula: IF(AND( NVM_Country__c = "Hungary", RecordType.Name = "Euroshell", ISPICKVAL(Sec_Channel__c,"JITB")),2, IF(AND( NVM_Country__c = "Belgium-FR", RecordType.Name = "Euroshell", ISPICKVAL(Sec_Channel__c,"JITB")),4, IF(AND( NVM_Country__c = "Belgium-NL", RecordType.Name = "Euroshell", ISPICKVAL(Sec_Channel__c,"JITB")),4, IF(AND( NVM_Country__c = "Netherlands", RecordType.Name = "Euroshell", ISPICKVAL(Sec_Channel__c,"JITB")),7, IF(AND( NVM_Country__c = "Poland", RecordType.Name = "Euroshell", ISPICKVAL(Sec_Channel__c,"JITB")),9, IF(AND( NVM_Country__c = "Switzerland-FR", RecordType.Name = "Euroshell", ISPICKVAL(Sec_Channel__c,"JITB")),11, IF(AND( NVM_Country__c = "Switzerland-DE", RecordType.Name = "Euroshell", ISPICKVAL(Sec_Channel__c,"JITB")),11, IF(AND( NVM_Country__c = "Switzerland-IT", RecordType.Name = "Euroshell", ISPICKVAL(Sec_Channel__c,"JITB")),11, IF(AND( NVM_Country__c = "Luxembourg", RecordType.Name = "Euroshell", ISPICKVAL(Sec_Channel__c,"JITB")),14 ,0)))))))))
CustomField.label: NVM CLID4
